alert.note: Alert for District of Columbia (District of Columbia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 09 at 1:35PM EST until November 09 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in the District of Columbia. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one to one and a half feet above normal. The next high tide at Washington Channel is at 5:25 PM.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
